price: Dan tidaklah kamu (Muhammad) berada di sisi yang sebelah barat 1126 ketika Kami menyampaikan perintah kepada Musa dan tiada pula kamu termasuk orang-orang yang menyaksikan.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: 1126.  Maksudnya, di sebelah barat lembah suci Ṭuwā. Lihat Surah (20) Ṭāha ayat 12.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta bijānibi al-gharbiyi idh qaḍaynā ilā mūsā al-amra wamā kunta mina al-shāhidīna
